ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was financially supported by the Natural Science Foundation of Xinjiang Autonomous Region (Grant No. 2019D01B50), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grant No. 31770461), and the Xinjiang Grassroots Youth Science and Technology Talent Training Project (Grant No. 2017Q103).We would like to thank LetPub ( www.letpub.com) for providing linguistic assistance during the preparation of this manuscript.
